The Kendal is a monster from the Mountain Daughter quest. He is located in the cave north of the Mountain Camp.

At first, the mountain people believe him to be the Kendal, one of their gods. However, he is actually a man in a suit. The player discovers the Kendal's secret after laughing at him and stating he looks like a man in a suit, to which the Kendal exclaims with "How did you find out!?"

He later admits he is a man living in solitude within the cave, taking on the persona of a god in order to be left alone. He also reveals himself to be a cannibal, stating that the corpses scattered about the centre of the room were victims who found his lair.

Once the player kills the Kendal they obtain the Bearhead and are able to put the chieftain's daughter, Asleif, to rest.

He can be fought in the Nightmare Zone after the quest is complete.

The Kendal proclaims his godhood.

Location[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Spawns Map
Cave north of the Mountain Camp701Maplink

Fighting tips[edit | edit source]

A player fighting the Kendal.

It is an easy fight; you do not need a lot of food (unless you're a lower level), and, if you have protect from melee, you don't need food at all, but might wish to bring a Prayer potion. A dwarf multicannon can be set up in the area to help kill the Kendal.

Drops[edit | edit source]

100%[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Bones1Always700
Bearhead1Always[d 1]Not sold0
  1. ↑ The bearhead only drops during Mountain Daughter.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The Kendal takes its name from the town of Kendal in the county of Cumbria, England. It may also be a reference to Grendel from the legend of Beowulf.
  • Another reference may be Eaters of the Dead, and The 13th Warrior, a movie based on it.
